title: Trump says Facebook's Libra currency has 'little standing or dependability'
text: The US president does not believe in Facebook's new cryptocurrency.

title: Trump: I'm 'not a fan' of cryptocurrencies, and Facebook may need a banking charter for Libra
text: U.S. President Donald Trump on Thursday said he’s “not a fan” of cryptocurrencies, and suggested that Facebook may need a banking charter if the company wants to launch Libra.

title: US tech companies face new French tax – four experts weigh in
text: France's Senate on Thursday approved a tax on revenues from major tech companies, including Google, Amazon and Facebook, raising the ire of the White House. Here's what the impact could be.

title: France approves digital tax targeting US tech companies
text: FoxNew.com columnist Liz Peek, Kaltbaum Capital Management President Gary Kaltbaum, FOX Business’ Kristina Partsinevelos and Capitalist Pig Hedge Fund’s Jonathan Hoenig on France’s new digital tax.

title: France to tax big tech despite US trade threat: RPT
text: Yahoo Finance's Brian Sozzi reports on France rolling out a  digital services tax on big tech companies such as Facebook and Google which may result in a retaliatory  tax from the United States.

title: Fed Chair Jerome Powell stressed concern over Facebook's Libra
text: Fed Chair Jerome Powell expressed 'serious concern' with Facebook's crypto currency when testifying before the Senate Banking Committee.

title: How Much Is Your Data Worth to Tech Companies? Lawmakers Want to Tell You, But It’s Not That Easy to Calculate
text: A proposed bill would force tech companies to tell users how much their data is worth. But how can a single number capture data's power to predict your actions or sway your decisions?

title: Social media companies will inevitbly see tighter privacy policies: Analyst
text: Mark Mahaney, lead internet analyst at RBC Capital Markets, talks about Fed chair Jerome Powell's remarks to Congress related to digital currency, namely Facebook's planned Libra coin, as well as how they are rejecting a new tax law in France on digital services.

title: Facebook AI forces poker pros to fold in Texas Hold'em tourney
text: The social network teamed up with Carnegie Mellon University to build an AI-powered, poker-playing bot. And it seems the gadget knows when to hold 'em and when to fold 'em.

title: Facebook now shows you who uploaded and shared your information for other advertisers to target you
text: Facebook is showing users more information about advertisers who upload their information, and the companies that are using that information to target ads.

title: Facebook tries to make ad targeting explanations more useful
text: Facebook has been adding new tools to provide more transparency about why users are seeing certain ads and content (and what they can do about it), but in a blog post today, Product Manager Sreethu Thulasi wrote, “We heard feedback from people that they can still be hard to understand and difficult to navigate.” To […]

title: Fed's Powell: Facebook's Libra raises 'serious concerns' about regulation
text: Fed chair Jerome Powell answers questions regarding Facebook's Libra cryptocurrency from Sen.

title: Fed to Probe Facebook's Libra as Powell Points to 'Serious Concerns'
text: Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell discusses the central bank's concerns about Facebook Inc.'s plans for its Libra cryptocurrency. He speaks in response to a question from House Financial Services Committee Chairman Representative Maxine Waters, a Democrat from California.

title: Trump's social media summit puts Facebook, Twitter on notice
text: Ahead of Thursday's summit, the president renews his criticisms of social media companies and says "we will not let them get away with it much longer."

title: Facebook Wants to Boost Its Virtual Reality Business With Big Deals
text: With the Oculus Quest off to a strong start, report says Facebook is considering buying a game studio.

title: Rep. Maxine Waters (D-CA) voices concern over Facebook and Libra
text: Yahoo Finance's Jessica Smith interviewed Rep.

title: How investors' perspective on tech is shifting
text: Facebook is not invited to the White House summit on social media but it's expected to be discussed. The company has been under fire in Washington and now Silicon Valley may be shifting investment views when it comes to social media.

title: Facebook's Libra cryptocurrency again comes under fire from global policymakers
text: Facebook's cryptocurrency hasn't even launched yet, but it's been the talk of the town for politicians and central bankers worldwide.

title: Facebook's Libra Will Fizzle As Banks Hit Back
text: While Facebook's new cryptocurrency, Libra, has the potential to change the game, banks and regulators may fight the tech giant at every turn. Is it possible that Facebook has another motive?

title: Even Worries over Disappointing Earnings Won’t Hold Facebook Stock Down
text: FB stock has had a difficult year, but is finding its way higher once again. Don't rule out Facebook stock making a run to back to its highs.

title: Why Bet on Facebook Stock Ahead of This Month’s Earnings Report
text: Facebook faces regulatory scrutiny from the U.S. government.

title: Bitcoin falls sharply as Fed's Powell flags 'serious concerns' about Facebook's cryptocurrency
text: Bitcoin is sliding after Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell poured cold water on Facebook's plans to launch a cryptocurrency.
